back: Causes bacterial wilt in a very wide range of potential host plants
Known as southern wilt, bacterial wilt, brown rot of potato, and Granville wilt when it occurs in tobacco

source: Clemson University - USDA Cooperative Extension Slide Series

back: Causes fireblight of apples and pears
Large epiphytic populations on stigmas of flowers leads to infection
The primary foliar disease of winter wheat in most western European countries
Causes necrotic blotches on wheat leaves
A major fungal pathogen of wheat
Causes glume blotch or Septoria nodorum blotch

source: Clemson University - USDA Cooperative Extension Slide Series, Bugwood.org
